document_data.name: ''Snow Tiger Helm''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Snow Tiger helms''''' were [[enchanted]] protective cowls made out of heads of [[snow tiger]]s and worn by the [[Snow Tiger lodge]] of Rashemi [[berserker]]s.
document_data.Powers: Each of these cowls offered the wearer a magical ''+2'' enchanted armor and dramatically boosted their physique constitution. Additionally, ''Snow Tiger helms'' made their wearers immune to magical and ordinary ''[[fear]]''.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, ''Snow Tiger helms'' were used by some of the Rashemaar berserkers stationed in the [[Ashenwood]]'s [[Lake of Tears Garrison]], a Rashemi fort led by a [[wychlaran]] [[Dalenka]]. [[Odesya]], the fort's requisitions officer, offered one of these items for sale to the fort's allies.
